name: Merge Unicorn - Idle Evolution
description:
WHO WE ARE:
we produce the best Evolution Games to solve the boredom of you.

Our Community is the heart of every game, because we produce new Evolution Game based on your interest and ideas.

Today we present you: Merge Unicorn

Our games are easy to learn but hard to master, this means you will
start slow and gets better during the game and challenged to get all the 30 Unicorn Evolutions to merge. (more will follow you soon! :-) )

Evolution Games Merge are a mix of different game types :

Idle, you earn money while you sleep
Clicker , you can fast forward on clicking each your bag timer until your finger hurts. :)
Merge Two , you can relax and match things together
Discovery, you always discover a new evolution on your next session.
Tycoon, invest your money smart to improve your gold income to get even richer and buy new evolutions on the fly.
KAWAII , who does not love cute, fluffy Evolutions! :)
Hatching, take care of all your evolutions
Challenge, compete with friends who Discover the next Evolution
Collect, complete all Evolutions and create your own.
Customise, you can customise each evolution on your own

Become part of the unicorn family.
Find out what happens when you put two identical unicorns together. WAIT they start evolve and become a new cool cute kawaii unicorn evolution.


Start small on the world, grow bigger to a new continent, even galaxies are not save for your cute, Merge Unicorns.

<3


HOW TO PLAY

It’s simpler then a matching game!

• As your Unicorns evolution drop coins, buy new Unicorns Evolution to earn even more coins

•Merge similar Unicorns Evolution to evolve them into new and more profitable Unicorns Evolution

• Also tap the Unicorns evolution to make more coins

Highlights

• 30 different forms of Unicorns evolution

• You can play our game offline, i means in every town in the world and also while driving in the car. You can even hatch your own unicorn dragons

• A cool mix of idle tycoon and incremental clicker mix like Tamago!

• Three possible endings: find the right god as you play!

Download Unicorns Merge Evolution now start your own journey


We love clicker and idle games the way you do! If you have any questions, found a bug or you have new upgrade ideas, get in touch with us! We appreciate your help a lot and donate it with a 5$ ingame code for free!
